page.title: 01Newton on Moor District
page.content: Two villages and nine farms, are in this undulating well treed area,with narrow road and clear streams. A by passing dual carriageway helps to maintain a peaceful quiet and neat countryside. More arable land is on east, while grass and plantations are more evident heading west. Currently the area is experiencing a growth of 'plotted' new housing,where the commuters travel as far as Tyneside to work. Many families have been here for several generations and family relationship abound. The hourly bus service makes a car an advantage for work and other needs outside the area. The needs of the farming community are provided locally by a mart. Repairs are both within the area boundaries and nearby plus services at Alnwick.
